text.div:
RefrainPolicy

Conveys prohibited actions which an information custodian, receiver, or user is not permitted to perform unless otherwise authorized or permitted under specified circumstances. Examples: prohibit redisclosure without consent directive

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode where concept is-a RefrainPolicy

name: RefrainPolicy
description:
Conveys prohibited actions which an information custodian, receiver, or user is not permitted to perform unless otherwise authorized or permitted under specified circumstances.  Examples:
  prohibit redisclosure without consent directive
